POEMA MORALE. Square brackets denote editorial insertions or emendations. Ich em nu alder þene ich wes awintre and a lare. Ich welde mare þene ich dede mi wit ahte bon mare. Wel longe ich habbe child ibon a worde and a dede Þah ich bo a wintre ald to ?ung ich em on rede. Vnnet lif ich habbe iled. and ?et me þingþ ilede. Þenne ich me bi-þenche wel ful sare ich me adrede. mest al þet ich habbe idon bi-fealt to child-hade. Wel late ich habbe me bi-þocht ? bute God me nu rede. Fole idel word ich habbe iqueðen soððen ich speke kuðe. fole ?unge dede idon ? þe me of-þinchet nuðe. Mest al þet me likede er nu ? hit me mislikeð þa muchel fulieð his wil ? hine solf he biswikeð. Ich mihte habbe bet idon. hefde ich þe iselþe. Nu ich walde ah ich ne mei ? for elde and for un-helþe. Elde me is bistolen on. er ich hit wiste. ne michte ich seon bi-fore me. for smike ne for miste. Er?e we beoð to done god. and to ufele al to þriste. Mare eie stondeð men of monne þanne hom do of criste. Þe wel ne doð þe hwile þe ho mu?en. wel oft hit schal rowen ? þenne ?e mawen sculen and repen þet ho er sowen. Do he to gode þet he mu?e þe hwile þet he bo aliue. ne lipnie na mon to muchel to childe ne to wiue. þe him solue for?et for wiue ne for childe ? he scal cumen in uuel stude bute him God bo milde. Sendeð sum god bi-foren eow. þe hw[i]le þet ?e mu?en to houene. for betere is an elmesse biforen ? þenne boð efter souene. Al to lome ich habbe igult a werke and o worde. Al to muchel ich habbe ispent. to litel ihud in horde. Ne beo þe loure þene þe solf ? ne þin mei. ne þin ma?e. Soht is þet is oðers monnes frond betre þen his a?en. Ne lipnie wif to hire were. ne were to his wiue Bo for him solue ech .Mon. þe hwile þet he bo aliue. Wis is þe to him solue þench þe hwile þe mot libben. For sone wule hine for?eten þe fremede and þe sibbe. þe wel ne deð þe hwile he mai ? ne scal [he] wenne he walde. Monies monnes sare iswinc habbeð oft unholde. Ne scal na mon don afirst. ne slawen wel to done. for moni mon bihateð wel þe hit for?eteð sone. Þe .Mon. þe wule siker bon to habben Godes blisse. Do wel him solf hwile þet he mai ? þenne haueð he his mid iwisse. þes riche .Men. weneð bon siker þurh walle and þurh diche. þe deð his echte on sikere stude he hit sent to heueneriche. For þer ne þerf he bon of-dred of fure ne of þoue þer ne þerf he him binimen þe laðe ne þe loue. þer ne þerf he habben kare of ?efe ne of ?elde. þider he sent. and solf bereð to lutel and to selde. þider we sculen dra?en and don wel ofte and ilome. for þer ne scal me us naut binimen mid wrangwise dome. þider ?e sculen ?orne dra?en. walde ?e god ileue. for ne mei þer hit ou binimen king ne reue. Al þet beste þet we hefden þider we hit solde senden for þer we hit michte finden eft. and habben buten ende. Þo þe er doð eni God for habben godes are. al he hit scal finden eft þer and hundred fald mare. Þe þet echte wile habben wel hwile þe he mu?e es welden. Giue hies for godes luue ? þenne deþ hes wel ihalden. Vre swinc and ure tilþe is ofte iwoned to swinden. Ach þet þe we doð for godes luue ? eft we sculen al finden. Ne scal nan ufel bon unbocht. ne nan god unfor?olden. Vfel we doð al to muchel. and god lesse þenne we sculden. Þo þe mest doð nu to gode. and þe lest to laðe. Eiðer to lutel and to muchel scal þunchen eft hom baþe. Þer me scal ure werkes weien bi-foran þe heuen king. and ?euen us ure swinkes lan efter ure erninge. Ech mon mid þet he hauet mei buggen houene riche. þe mare haueþ and þe þe lesse ? baþe hi mu?en iliche. Alse mid his penie alse oðer mið his punde. þet is þe wunderlukeste chep ? þet eni mon efre funde. And þe ðe mare ne mai don ? do hit mid his gode þonke. Alse wel se þe þe haueð golde fele manke. And oft god kon mare þonc þen þe him ?eueð lesse. And his werkes and his we?es his milce. and rihtwisnesse. lutel lac is gode lof ? þet kumeð of gode wille. And ec-lete muchel ?eue of þan þe herte is ille. Houene and horþe he ouer sich. his e?en boð swa brichte Sunne and mone and houen fur boð þestre a?ein his lihte. Nis him noht forholen nihud. swa muchele boð his mihte. nis hit ne swa derne [idon] ne [a] swa þostre nihte. he wat wet þenkeð and hwet doð alle quike wihte. Nis na lauerd swich se is crist. ne king swuch ure drihten. houene and orðe and al þet is biloken is in his honde. he deð al þet his wil is ? a wettre and alonde. He makede fisses in þe se and fu?eles in þe lifte. he wit and waldeð alle þing and scop alle scefte. he is hord buten horde and ende buten ende. he ane is eure an ilche stude wende þer þu wende. he is buuen us and binoþen. biforen and bihinden. þe þe deð godes wille uwer he mei him finden. Helche rune he iherð and wat [he] alle deden. he þurþ-sicheþ uches monnes þonc. wi hwat scal us to rede. We þet brokeð godes hese and gulteð swa ilome. hwet scule we seggen oðer don et þe muchele dome Þa þe luueden unriht and ufel lif leden. Wet sculen ho seggen oðer don ? þen þe engles bon of-dred. hwet sculen we beren biforen us mid hom scule we iquemen. þo þe neure god ne dude þe houenliche deme[n]. þer sculen bon doule swa fole þet wulleð us forwreien. And nabbeð hi naþing for?eten of al þet ho [ere] ise?en. Al þet we misduden her ? ho hit wulleð kuðe þere. Al ho habbeð in hore write þet we misduden here. [Buten we habben it ibet þe wile we her were] Þach we nusten ne nise?en. ho weren ure ifere. Hwet sculen ordlinghes don þa swicen and ta for-sworene hwi boð fole iclepede. and swa lut icorene wi hwi weren ho bi?eten to hwon weren ho iborene. þet sculen bon to deþe idemet. and eure ma forlorene. Ech .Mon. scal him solue þer biclepie and bidemen. his a?en werch and his þonc te witnesse he scal demen. ne mei him na Mon alsa wel demen ne alswa rihte for nan ne knauð him ase ?ere ? buten ane drihte. Ech .Mon. wat him solue best ? his werkes. and his wille. Þe ðe lest wat biseið ofte mest ? þe hit al wat is stille. nis nan witnesse alse muchel se monnes a?en horte. Wa se seið þet he bo hal. him solf wat best his smirte. Ech .Mon. scal hin solf demen to deðe oðer to liue. þa witnesse of his a?en werch ? hine þer to scal driue. Al þet ech .Mon. haueð idon soððen he com to monne sculde he hit sechen o boke iwriten he scal iþenchen þenne. Ah drihten ne demeð nenne .Mon. efter his biginnigge. ah al his lif scal bon suilch boð his endinge. ?ef þet his [ende is] uuel al hit is uuel and [al] God ?efe god his ende. God ?eue þet ure ende bo god. and wite þet he us lende. þe .Mon. þet uuel don na god. ne neure god lif leden. er deð and dom come to his dure he mei him sare adreden. þet he ne mu?e þenne biden are. for þet itit ilome. for-þi he is wis þe biet and bit and bet bi-fore dome. Wenne deð is attere dure wel late he biddeþ are. Wel late he latheð uuel werc ? þe ne mei hit don ne mare. þet achten we to leuen wel. for ure drihten solf hit seide. A hwilke time se eure .Mon. of þinchþ his mis-dede. Oþer raþer oðer later ? milce he scal imeten. Ac we þet þer naf[eð] nocht ibet ? wel muchel he haueð to beten. Moni mon seit hwa rechð of pine þe scal habben ende. Ne bidde ich na bet bo alesed a domes dei of bende. Lutel he wat wet is pine. and lutel he hit scaweð hwice hete is þer þa saule wuneð hu biter wind þer blaweð. hefde he bon þer enne dei oðer twa bare tide ? nolde he for al middenerd þe þerdde þer abiden. þet habbeð iseid þ[et] comen þonen þa hit wisten mid iwissen. wa wurð sor?e seue?er. for souenihte blisse. In hure blisse þe þe ende haueð. for endelese pine. betere is wori water drunch ? þen atter meind mid wine. Swines brede is swiðe swete. swa is of wilde dore. alto dore he is abuh ? þe ?efð þer fore his swore. Ful wombe mei lihtliche speken of hunger. and of festen ? swa mei of pine þe ne cnauð [hu] þe scal a ilesten. Hefð he ifonded summe stunde ? he wolde al seggen oðer. Et-lete him were wif. child. suster. feder and broðer. Al he walde and oðerluker don and oðerluker þenchen Wenne he bi-þohte on helle fur þe nawiht ne mei quenchen. Eure he walde her inne wawe and ine wene wunien ? Wið þet þe mihte helle pine bi-flien and bi-sunien Et lete him were al world wele and orðliche blisse. for to þet muchele blisse cumen is murþe mid iwisse. Iwule nu cumen eft to þe dome þet ich er ow of sede A þa dei and at ta dome us helpe crist and rede. þer we mu?en bon eþe offerd and herde us adreden. þer he scal al son him biforen his word and ec his deden. Al scal þer bon þenne cud þer men lu?en her ent stelen. Al scal þer bon þanne unwron ? þet men wru?en her and helen. We sculen alre monne lif iknauwen [þer] alse ure ahen. þer sculen eueningges bon þe riche and þe la?e. Ne scal na mon smakie þer ne þerf he him adreden. Gif him her of-þincþ his gult and bet his misdede. For him ne scameþ ne ne gromeð þe sculen bon ibor?en. Ach þoþre habbeþ scome and grome and oft fele sor?e. Þe dom scal sone bon idon ne lest he nawiht longe. ne scal him na mon mene þer of strengþe ne of wronge. Þe sculen habbe herdne dom þa her weren herde. Þa þe uuele holden wreche men and uuele la?e redde. Ec efter þet he efð idon s[c]al þer þenne [beon] idemet. [Bliþe mai he þanne buen þe god haued iquemed] Alle þa þi sprunge boþ of adam and of eue. Alle hi sculen cumen þider for soðe we hit ileueð. þa þe habbeð wel idon efter hore mihte. to houene riche hi sculen faren forð mid ure drihte. Þa þe habbeð doules werc idon. and þer inne bo ifunde. hi sculen faren forð mid him in to helle grunde. Þer hi sculen wunien a buten are and ende. Ne brekeþ ne ure drihte helle gate for lesen hi of bende. Nis na sullic þech hom bo wa and hom bo uneade. Ne scal neure eft crist þolie deþ for lesen hom of deaþe. Enes drihten helle brec his frond he ut brochte. him solf he þolede deð for him. wel dore he hom bohte. Nalde hit mei do for mei. ne suster for broðer. nalde hit sune do for fader. ne na mon for oðer. Vre alre lauerd for his þrelles ipined wes a rode. vre bendes he unbon[d] and bohte us mid his blode. We ?eueð uneðe for his luue a stuche of ure brede. Ne þenke we noht þet he scal deme þa quike and þa dede. Muchele luue he us cudde. walde we hit understonde þet ure eldre misduden; we habbeð uuele on honde. Deþ com in þis middenerde þurh þes doules honde. And sake and sor?e and swinc a watere and a londe. vre forme fader gult. we abu?eð alle. [Al his ofsprunge after hym in herme is bifalle] þurst and hunger. chele and hete. helde and unhelðe. þurh him deð com in þis middenerd and oðer uniselðe. Nere namon elles ded ne sec ne nan unsele. ac mihten libben eure ma a blisse and a hele. lutel hit þuncheð moni mon. ac muchel wes þa sunne. for hwam alle þolieð deð þe comen of hore cunne. Hore sunne and ec ure a?en sare us mei of-þinche. þurh sunne we libbeð alle in sor?e and in swinke. Suððen God nom swa muchele wrake for are misdede ? We þe swa muchel and swa ofte mis-doð. we mu?en eðe us adrede. Adam and his of-sprung for are þare sunne. Wes fele undret wintre an helle pine and an unwunne. Þa þe ledden hore lif mid unriht and mid wrange. buten hit godes milce do ho sculen bon þer wel longe. Godes wisdom is wel muchel and alswa is his mihte And nis his milce naut lesse. ac bi þan ilke iwichte. Mare he ane mei for?euen. þen al folc gulte cunne. Sulf douel mihte habben milce. ?if he hit bigunne. Þa þe godes milce secheð ? he iwis mei ha ifinden. Ac helle king is are-les with þa þe he mei binden. þe þe deþ is wille mest ? he haueð wurst mede. His baþ scal bon wallinde. his bað scal bon berninde glede. Wurst he deð his gode frond ? þenne his fulle fond[e] ? God scilde alle godes frond. a wih swilche freonde. Neure in helle hi com. ne þer ne come reche. Þach ich elches worldes wele. þer me mahte feche þet his wulle seggen on þat wise men us seiden. And aboken hit writen þer [me] mei hit reden. Ich hit wille seggen þan þe hit hom solf nusten. Warni hom wið hore unfrome. ?if ho me wulleð lusten. Vnderstondeð nu to me edi men and arme. Ich wulle tellen of helle pin ? and wernin ow wið herme. In helle his hunger and þurst ? twa uuele iuere. þas [pine] þolieð þa weren maket niþinges here. Þer is waning and wow. efter eche streche. ho fareð from hete to hete. and hech to frure þe wreche. þenne hi bið in þere hete ? þe chele him þunchet blisse. þenne hi cumeð eft to þe chele ? of hete hi habbeð misse. hi hem deð wa inoch nabbeð hi nane blisse. Nute hi hweþer hom deþ wurs mid neure nane wisse. hi walkeð eure and secheð reste ac ho ne mu?en imeten. for-þi þe ho nolden þe hwile þet ho mihten here sunne beten. ho secheð reste þer nis nan. for-þi ne mu?en hi es finden. Ac walkeð weri up and dun ? se water deþ mid winde. þo boð þa þe weren her a þanke unstedefeste. And þa þe gode biheten heste and nolden hit ileste. Þa þe god werc bigunnen and ful enden hit nolden. Nu witen her. and nuðe þer. and nusten hwat hi wolden. þer is bernunde pich hore saule to baþien inne. þa þe ledden here lif in werre and in winne. Þer is fur þet is undret fald hattre. þene bo ure. Ne mei quenchen salt weter ne uersc of þe burne. Þis is þet fur þet efre bernd ne mei nawiht hit quenchen. Þer inne boð þa þe was to lof wreche men to swenchen. þa þe weren swikelemen and ful of uuel wrenchen. þa þe mihten uuel don. þe þe lef hit wes to þenchen. Þe luueden tening and stale. hordom and drunken And a doules werche bliþeliche swunken. Þa þe weren swa lese þet me hom ne mihte ileuen. Med-ierne domes men. and wrongwise reuen. þet oðer monnes wif lof. his a?en et-lete. þo þe sungede muchel ? a drunke and an ete. þe wreche mon binom his ehte. and leide his on horde. þet lutel let of godes borde. and godes worde. And þo þe his a?en nalde ?euen þer he isech. þe node ne nalde iheren godes sonde. þenne he hit herde bode. Þe þet is oðers monnes þing. loure þene hit sculde. And weren to gredi of solure and of golde. And þa þe untrownesse duden þon þe ho sculden bon holde. And leten þet ho sculden don. and duden þet ho wolden. Þa þe weren eure abuten þisse worldes echte. And duden al þet þe laþe gast hechte to and tachte. And alle þe þen anigewise doulen iquemde. Þa boð nu mid him in helle fordon and fordemet. he mai. of þos helle pine And warnie æc his frend þer wid. so ic habbe mine Þo þe scilden heom ne cunnen. ic heom wulle teache ich kan beo ?if i scal. lichame and soule liache Lete we þat god for-bet. alle mancunne and do we þat he us hat. and scilde we us wid sunne Luuie we god mid vre heorte. and mid al vre mihte and vre emcristene alse us suelf. swa us lerde drihte Al þat me rat and singð. be-fore godes borde al it hanged and bi-halt. bi þisse twam worde Alle godes lawe he fulð. þe newe and þe ealde he þe þos twa luue haued. and wel hi wule healde Ac hi buð wunder erued-helde. swa ofte we gulted alle for it is strong to stonde longe. and liht it is to falle Ac drihte crist he ?iue us strencþe. stonde þat we mote and of alle vre gultes. unne us come bote We wilnied efter worldes wele. þe longe ne mai ileste and leggeð al ure iswinch. on þinge un-stede-faste Sswunche we for godes luue. half þat we doð for ehte ne were we nout swa bi-cherd. ne swa vuele bi-cauhte ?if we serueden god. so we doð erninges more we haueden of heuene. þanne eorles oþer kinges Ne muwen hi her werien heom wid chele. wid þurst. ne wid hunger ne wid elde ne wid deð. þe eldre ne þe ?eonger Ac þer nis hunger ne þurst ne deð. ne vnhelþe ne elde of þisse riche we þenchet oft. and of þere to selde We scolden alle us bi-þenche. oft and wel ilome hwet we beð. and to wan we sculle. and of wan we come Hu lutel wile we beð her. hu longe elles ware hwat we mu?en habben her. and hwet elles hware ?if we were wise men. þis we scolden iþenche bute we wurþe us iwar. þes worlð us wule for-drenche Mest Þos god un-ieþe to-?eanes þe cliue a?ean þe he?e hulle þos leteð al here a?en wil. for godes hese to fulle Go we alle þene wei. for he us wulle bringe mid þo faire feuwe men. be-foren heuene kinge Þer
